title: Ammo&Bullet1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.

The Ammo & Bullet Sound Effects Pack is a comprehensive collection of sounds designed for various ammunition and bullet-related scenarios. It includes a wide range of sounds such as BulletHit, BulletWhiz, BulletShell, and more. These sounds are tailored for different materials like Body, Car, Dirt, Glass, Ground, Human, Metal, Wall, Windows, Windshield, Wood, Cement, Snow, and others. With both stereo and mono audio files provided, this pack is suitable for use in games, movies, and animation projects. It offers flexibility for applying UI effects or location-specific in-game sounds.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Ammo & Bullet Sounds: The pack covers a variety of ammunition and bullet-related sounds, including hits, whizzes, and shell drops.
  • Material-Specific Sounds: Sounds are categorized based on materials, providing realism and specificity for different scenes and settings.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: The audio files are separated into stereo and mono, allowing for flexible use in UI effects, specific in-game locations, and more.



📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • Bullet_Hit 130.
  • Body 16
  • Car 5
  • Dirt 20
  • Glass 15
  • Ground 2
  • Human 16
  • Metal 14
  • Wall 3
  • Wondow 15
  • Windshield 11
  • Wood 13
  • Bullet_Shell 155
  • Basic 44
  • Box 14
  • Cement 40
  • Drop 8
  • Metal 25
  • Snow 5
  • Wood 19
  • Bullet_Whiz 150
  • Whiz 150



⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 870
  • Number of Audio Cues: 870
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 7:48
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : 0dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
